nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the fund's mUSD token balance supplied to the mStable savings contract.

nodes.documentation:
@dev Approves mUSD tokens to the mStable savings contract without spending gas on every deposit.
@param amount Amount of mUSD tokens to approve to the mStable savings contract.

devdoc.author: David Lucid <david@rari.capital> (https://github.com/davidlucid)
devdoc.details: This library handles deposits to and withdrawals from mStable liquidity pools.

approve(uint256).details: Approves mUSD tokens to the mStable savings contract without spending gas on every deposit.

params.amount: Amount of mUSD tokens to approve to the mStable savings contract.

deposit(uint256).details: Deposits mUSD tokens to the mStable savings contract.

params.amount: The amount of mUSD tokens to be deposited.

getBalance().details: Returns the fund's mUSD token balance supplied to the mStable savings contract.

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdraws mUSD tokens from the mStable savings contract. May withdraw slightly more than `amount` due to imperfect precision.

params.amount: The amount of mUSD tokens to be withdrawn.

withdrawAll().details: Withdraws all funds from the mStable savings contract.

devdoc.title: MStablePoolController
